Posts.Content: Feb 12, 2010 10:24AM - edited Feb 14, 2010 06:08PM by Beets Kemdrx- Â I was part of a PARP trial very similar to the one you are on. I was part of a group of newly diagnosed TN. I found taking ativan before my treatment and then again after helped tremendously. If it helps at all, the PARP trail was a complete success. My 5cm tumor disappeared and I had no lymph node activity after completing the trial. It worked for me so I hope it works for you too. Good luck, Beets
